steps.title: Prepare the Area
steps.description: Move furniture, cover the floor, and tape edges for clean lines.

steps.title: Prime the Wall
steps.description: Apply primer evenly with a roller to help paint adhere and cover any previous stains or colors.

steps.title: Paint the Wall
steps.description: Use a brush for edges and corners, then roll paint onto large areas, applying even pressure.

steps.title: Apply Second Coat
steps.description: Once dry, add a second coat for a consistent, polished finish, covering any thin spots.

steps.title: Remove Tape
steps.description: Carefully peel off painterâ€™s tape before the paint fully dries to reveal sharp, clean edges.

steps.title: Clean Up
steps.description: Wash tools, inspect the wall for missed spots, touch up as needed, and return the furniture to its place.

steps.title: Prepare the Subfloor
steps.description: Ensure the subfloor is clean, level, and dry before starting.

steps.title: Lay the Underlayment
steps.description: Install an underlayment to provide cushioning and reduce noise.

steps.title: Install the Flooring
steps.description: Lay the flooring according to manufacturer instructions, ensuring a tight fit and proper alignment.

steps.title: Cut and Fit the Edges
steps.description: Trim any excess flooring and fit around corners and obstacles.

steps.title: Secure the Flooring
steps.description: Attach the flooring to the subfloor using nails, glue, or a click-lock system as required.

steps.title: Finish the Edges
steps.description: Install baseboards or trim to cover the edges of the flooring and complete the look.

steps.title: Inspect the Roof
steps.description: Examine the existing roof for damage and necessary repairs.

steps.title: Remove Old Roofing
steps.description: Carefully strip away the old roofing material to prepare for the new installation.

steps.title: Repair Roof Deck
steps.description: Fix any damaged or rotten sections of the roof deck before installing new materials.

steps.title: Install Underlayment
steps.description: Lay down a waterproof underlayment to protect the roof deck from water infiltration.

steps.title: Apply New Roofing Material
steps.description: Install the new roofing material, such as shingles or metal panels, according to manufacturer specifications.

steps.title: Inspect and Clean Up
steps.description: Inspect the completed roof for any issues and clean up the work area, removing debris and old materials.

steps.title: Plan and Measure
steps.description: Determine the project requirements and take accurate measurements.

steps.title: Select Materials
steps.description: Choose appropriate wood or other materials based on the project specifications.

steps.title: Cut and Prepare Materials
steps.description: Cut the materials to size and prepare them for assembly.

steps.title: Assemble Components
steps.description: Assemble the cut materials into the desired structure or framework.

steps.title: Finish and Install
steps.description: Apply any finishes, such as paint or stain, and install the completed carpentry work.

steps.title: Inspect and Adjust
steps.description: Check the final work for accuracy and make any necessary adjustments.

steps.title: Consultation and Planning
steps.description: Discuss design goals and plan the layout and style of the interior space.

steps.title: Choose Color Schemes and Materials
steps.description: Select colors, fabrics, and materials that align with the design vision.

steps.title: Furniture and Decor Selection
steps.description: Choose and arrange furniture and decor items to enhance the functionality and aesthetics of the space.

steps.title: Implement Design
steps.description: Execute the design plan by arranging furniture, hanging artwork, and adding finishing touches.

steps.title: Final Review and Adjustments
steps.description: Review the completed design and make any necessary adjustments to ensure satisfaction.

steps.title: Client Walkthrough
steps.description: Conduct a final walkthrough with the client to ensure all aspects of the design meet expectations.

steps.title: Assess Needs and Goals
steps.description: Determine the desired smart home features and capabilities.

steps.title: Choose Smart Devices
steps.description: Select smart devices and systems that meet the identified needs and goals.

steps.title: Install Devices
steps.description: Install smart devices, such as thermostats, lights, and security systems, according to manufacturer instructions.

steps.title: Configure and Connect
steps.description: Set up and connect the devices to a central hub or smart home network.

steps.title: Test Functionality
steps.description: Test all devices and systems to ensure they function correctly and integrate seamlessly.

steps.title: Provide Training and Support
steps.description: Offer training to the homeowner on using the smart home features and provide ongoing support as needed.

steps.title: Assess Damage
steps.description: Evaluate the extent of structural damage and determine necessary repairs.

steps.title: Develop Repair Plan
steps.description: Create a detailed plan for the repair work, including materials and methods.

steps.title: Prepare the Site
steps.description: Prepare the site for repairs by removing damaged materials and setting up necessary supports.

steps.title: Carry Out Repairs
steps.description: Perform the repair work, including reinforcing or replacing structural elements.

steps.title: Inspect and Validate
steps.description: Inspect the completed repairs to ensure they meet structural standards and safety requirements.

steps.title: Clean Up and Final Review
steps.description: Clean up the work area and conduct a final review to ensure all repairs are complete and satisfactory.
